directions: Mix Alfredo sauce, peas, and ham together in a saucepan over medium heat; cook and stir until sauce is heated through, about 5 minutes.
Arrange the biscuit bottoms in a serving dish. Pour sauce over biscuits and top with the biscuit tops.
ingredients: 1 (15 ounce) jar four-cheese Alfredo sauce (such as Classico®)
title: Easy Ham a la King
